statements: SELECT * FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code, execution_logs FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts WHERE contract_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts WHERE contract_name = 'Uniswap';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts WHERE contract_code LIKE '%flash loan%';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, execution_logs -> 'timestamp' AS execution_timestamp FROM DeFi_Smart_Contracts WHERE execution_logs ->> 'status' = 'success';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_code, execution_logs FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT * FROM contract_audit_logs ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_id, executed_by FROM contract_audit_logs WHERE executed_by = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_id, contract_code, execution_logs FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 'aeb708d6-2a1c-4a7f-8f0a-63b5b122a6fc';
SELECT log_id, contract_id, execution_timestamp, executed_by FROM contract_audit_logs ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_code LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM contract_audit_logs WHERE executed_by = 'Admin' AND execution_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT contract_id, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id IN ('aeb708d6-2a1c-4a7f-8f0a-63b5b122a6fc', 'f0d4ce5f-9d7e-4e07-ae62-0798f9b9c646');
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT execution_timestamp, executed_by FROM contract_execution_logs WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, execution_timestamp FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_execution_logs ON smart_contracts.id = contract_execution_logs.contract_id;
SELECT audit_id, action_performed, action_timestamp, performed_by FROM audit_trail;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, id, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contract_execution_logs ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action_performed, action_timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE performed_by = 'Admin' ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;

SELECT contract_name, COUNT(*) AS total_executions FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_execution_logs ON smart_contracts.id = contract_execution_logs.contract_id GROUP BY contract_name HAVING total_executions > 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_contract_code
SELECT contract_name, code FROM smart_contract_code ORDER BY contract_name DESC
SELECT execution_date, execution_result FROM execution_logs WHERE contract_id = 1
SELECT user_name, user_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_balance > 1000
SELECT log_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audit_trail ORDER BY audit_id ASC
SELECT * FROM smart_contract_code WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, code FROM smart_contract_code WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT u.user_name, a.audit_date FROM user_accounts u INNER JOIN audit_trail a ON u.user_id = a.log_id;
SELECT code, execution_result FROM smart_contract_code sc JOIN execution_logs el ON sc.contract_id = el.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT owner_name, contract_name FROM contract_owners INNER JOIN smart_contracts ON contract_owners.contract_id = smart_contracts.contract_id;
SELECT trail_id, action_type, action_date FROM audit_trails ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, analysis_result FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_result = 'successful';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM execution_logs WHERE execution_result = 'Success';
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, contract_name FROM contract_owners JOIN smart_contracts ON contract_owners.contract_id = smart_contracts.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, analysis_result FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
